title: Add BrightLocal citation integration
description: Integrate BrightLocal MCP API for syncing domains and building citations. Includes API client, database schema, and UI updates.

title: Add domain selection for Relate sync
description: Add checkboxes to domains page to select which domains to push to Relate

title: Add multi-user settings support
description: Add settings table and UI so multiple users can configure their own API credentials

title: Deploy Relate automation to Vercel
description: Configure Playwright to work on Vercel serverless. May need cloud browser service like Browserless.io

title: Configure Namecheap credentials for automation
description: Set NAMECHEAP_USERNAME and NAMECHEAP_PASSWORD in Vercel environment
